title: Ticket #3356: Gridmanager crash when cream job has VOMS-less proxy
description:
In the gridmanager, when AcquireProxy() reads an X.509 user proxy, it always sets has_voms_attrs to true in the resulting data structure, regardless of whether the proxy has any VOMS attributes. This defeats a check for cream jobs for VOMS info in the proxy, and CreamResource::CreamResource() ends up trying to strdup() a NULL pointer when copying VOMS attribute information.

Correcting the value of ProxySubject::has_voms_attr in AcquireProxy() fixes the crash. If a cream job's proxy doesn't have VOMS attributes, the job is instead held in the queue, as originally intended.
